website_summaries.verdict: The Astro Gaming A10 wired gaming headset takes the excellent comfort and audio performance of the company's much more expensive models and puts them in a budget-friendly package.

customer_reviews.title: Nearly... Very nearly the best
customer_reviews.text: So I have a lot of headphones but only 6 dedicated gaming ones, of which the Astro A 10's are the latest acquisition. They are solidly built and look nice with the green accents. The Microphone is excellent and easily as good as anything out there. With regards to sound, these cans have a lovely bass asthetic which whilst it has a wide sound stage due to the huge ear cups it has a all encompassing feel, basically it feels like your in the world. Especially on xbox one with dolby atmos enabled. I would say these are not as good as the cloud alpha 2's in terms of raw sound precision, but they are not a million miles away.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with the A10
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the durability claims after two Turtle Beach headsets broke due to cracky plastic in the headbands. So far so good with the A10. The audio is not quite as crisp as I would like, it's little bit too soft basey sound but overall this is a minor gripe and it's a good headset.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have a big head
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and great build quality. They do seem to grip your ear a bit tight - but after a few months I seem to have gotten used to it. Maybe my head's just too big
customer_reviews.author: MDK

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is great. It managed to dampen noise from my ungrounded ...
customer_reviews.text: Microphone is great. It managed to dampen noise from my ungrounded computer (something that USB microphone failed to do for me). First headset i own that feels comfortable wearing glasses. Wore them for four hours straight, once—my ears did not sweat. I was unfortunate enough to receive one where bass (subwoofer) on the left earcup did not work (worked fine on the right one). Support was AMAZING at Astro. I had no problem getting a replacement fast. I am now astro fanman!
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Well built, but has too many compromises.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's really well built and can handle lots of wear and tear. Unfortunately the headset is really heavy and starts to become uncomfortable after about 5-10 minutes (especially when wearing glasses!). One point to note is that you have to really push the cable in when plugging it in otherwise you will only be able to hear out of one ear! The sound quality on these is terrible compared to other headsets in this price range, particulary the bass.
customer_reviews.author: SpinalSnowCat

customer_reviews.title: Top headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones for the price! Ear cups fit right over my ears instead of sitting on top of them, did a 5 hour battlefield session and had minimal discomfort. Sound quality is good but not amazing, expected this for the price. Build quality is really good, they're sturdy but this also means they're not much flexibility in the headband. My only con is there's no mic mute button at all. This is annoying for playing solo on multilayer games. Overall really solid headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mc Gloin

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones, found them annoying with glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and you oah for the quality, don’t be duped by cheaper alternatives that look and feel nice, it’s all about how well they sound, feel and crucially: connect. This does all the above to such a high standard, my only gripe is that I have to adjust them every now and then as my glasses are digging into my ear but that’s a minor thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap set of headphones but no match for the big dogs
customer_reviews.text: After half an hour to an hour of playing my head starts to hurt with these headphones especially the top of my head and around the ears where the headphones actually touch your head, the durability is really good they good enough for the price the sound quality is good but no match for the turtle beach headphones I had but at half the price I can't complain but just remember they hurt which would make me not buy again but I'm not dissapointed with them either
customer_reviews.author: James MacRae

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So i got mine monday 1st September and its now the 2nd so a full 24hrs and abit and i can say that these are not comfortable around the ear my ears feel bruised yes i playing 5+ hours with breaks in between straight but for the price and brand u would expect alittle more comfortability as thats key to gaming headsets, sound quality n loudness tho is so brilliant when in game i cant even hear myself talk so i get moaned at for shouting but ohwell haha durability is good to iv done a bend on it n thats good for ragers😂 just please sort out the padding cuz it’s rough on the ears
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for fps and adventure games. Using it mostly for cod, battlefield and god of war. The mic sound superb! But it also lacks of loud volume, on ps4 even on max sound settings i still can't feel it is enough... and the cushions eventually hurt my ears and head as it feels too tight... 4 stars is the perfect description for them.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Although these were sold as used with a 90 day warranty and which was given to our grandson and so far they are good but I hope they will not disappoint our grandson and give him many happier years although the package wasn’t the best
customer_reviews.author: MRS TINA CARD

customer_reviews.title: Mic/Headphone splitter needed for microphone to work with PC.
customer_reviews.text: It says it works with PC, it does, but not straight of the box. You need cable splitter to make the mic work with PC. So it's kinda misleading. Even the box has written on it XBOX ONE, it doesn't even mention PC on the box at all. So if you want your mic to work on PC you need to additionally buy splitter which adds up to price they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Fasung

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good for the price but they can be a little unconformable on the head band over a long period of time and the mic can be a little quite to others but turn up the mic sensitivity on the console and it fixes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best headset I have used
customer_reviews.text: The best headset I have personally used I can hear people from the other side of the map on call of duty and hear footsteps all over clear as day the noise cancellation is good aswell as it block out all the little noises you wouldn’t want to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Olly

customer_reviews.title: Came broke. Don't buy online. There are better headsets
customer_reviews.text: It's a good headset overall but do not buy it here. It came for me once and it broke within 4 weeks. I refunded it and got a new one but it came broken. The headband hurts after 30 mins. It's just sore. I wouldn't get this if ur looking for a good headset that's doesn't get sore after time. There's better options. U get what u pay for. Buy the a20 or something from razor. And make sure u don't buy it online. Get it in a store
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Morris

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Poor customer service, charged the full price instead of the discounted price advertised. Would not use the company again. Head phones are good.
customer_reviews.author: joanne jessop

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headset
customer_reviews.text: For an actual decent price you get one of the best headsets on the market right now. A must for PC players due to the: Flexible, almost unbreakable design. Amazing sound quality Comfortable design wich fits any head and ear size. Gotta say the only problem was setting it up as you really gotta push the grey wire into the headset until its fully in as it only plays in one ear. 4.7/5 Great Buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gaming headset at an excellent price. It fitted head area comfortably and the sound quality was brilliant. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great for console but not PC.
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent headset for gaming in consoles however it is not compatible with Pc out of the box. For it to be compatible you have to purchase another cable separately.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: A real steal!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my Xbox One and they are great. Great quality product with a very expensive feel. I’ve had previous headsets before which sit on the ear where as this one your ear sits in a pocket which is a great design. Very comfortable and fantastic sound and mic quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McCallen

customer_reviews.title: No Background Noise
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised this was included in a Logitech bundle. I was expecting a set of Logitech headphones. I don't like the way the microphone switches on/off, and the sound is a bit too quiet for me (I am slightly deaf) even up full. I have gone back to my old headphones
customer_reviews.author: John Merrilees

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Brill sound quality and noise cancellation. Fits comfortably on the head, adjustable, sturdy, good for xbox gaming
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant value!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen many people use Astro headsets and speak highly of them so I decided to purchase this one. Looks great, probably better in person than the actual images shown and feels really comfortable on your head and around the ears when being used. Audio quality is much better than my old headset. The material feels and looks quality. Would highly recommend to anyone. Best headset I've purchased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Parry

customer_reviews.title: Microphone stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second A10 headset i have had and the microphone stops working. This time it lasted three weeks. A Google search shows that it is a common problem with the A10 headset. I would not recomend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JimB

customer_reviews.title: Good all rounder however....
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when selecting the colours, I selected the green and grey headset, as it was the cheapest, to use with my PS4. Even though it states that it is compatible with the PS4 I had no luck in getting it to work properly as the microphone was not being picked up. Make sure you buy the specific colour as they are relative to the platform.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Microphone/connection issues
customer_reviews.text: I have had my pair since August 2019. They have been great up untill the last few weeks. I am getting told that whenever I speak it sounds like a hurricane and it keeps crackling. I've heard the noise and it's not good. I have had to buy a new lead to see if it's a connection problem. If it dosn't work I won't be happy as I havn't had them long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone for £30 on warehouse deals
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these from warehouse deals for 30£ which is a good price but I’m not sure I would pay 60£ for them. Sound and mic very good but bit heavy in your head
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headphones. Have them around 2 years. Only issue is that the cable is odd and if it breaks you need to buy that specific case off the Astro Gaming website which isnt exactly cheap. So be careful with the cable
customer_reviews.author: Eoin Reidy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Arrives quickly, well wrapped. Bought For my son who loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great all around headset
customer_reviews.text: Great for gaming, great surround sound for shooters, appropriate cable length, good mic quality, only complaints are they’re a huge drain on battery life. The batteries I use normally get 20 hours charge for just the controller but with the headset that comes down to about 7, aside from that they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sam McMullan

customer_reviews.title: All around amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headset. The on off mic is amazing. They sound deep and very detailed and block out noise so you can play in peace !
customer_reviews.author: Chriss.c

customer_reviews.title: Nice one lime pro
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and expected A10 headset.however in box was car shine bottle with rag. Possibly innocent explanation we will have to see.still waiting for refund
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are good for price but if you want extended game sessions these things hurt your ears after a hour. Spend bit more and get some with ski google bands, way more comfortable and the cups are softer
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Don’t allow the wires to twist good fir the job
customer_reviews.author: good

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for price
customer_reviews.text: I play COD on these and their amazing for their price! 100% worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Astro
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the zelda edition a10s I received the red a10s... Just felt they didn't have this item and sent me this to keep me quiet.. Plus the item I received was the cheaper item... awaiting a refund for the difference but the headset is really good otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Mattholland

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: ive had for about 6months very good sound etc.. BUT.. its giving me a bold spot on top my head :@ and my ears are always super itches when wearing them
customer_reviews.author: ptlqxmgndtzw

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound Quality, PHENOMENAL DURABILITY
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Sound quality for a budget headset with an in line cable that has volume rocker on it ables controll with ease. Flip to mute mic very convenient and the durability is insane! Only thing I have to say it after longer gaming sessions 4+ hrs it can start to ache ears but nothing that a 10 minute break can’t sort out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Crook

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality but the microphone broke for me after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Best headset under £100 (Bought for PS4)
customer_reviews.text: Best headset under £100 for PS4. Make sure that the wire is pushed in, on the grey side to headset, firmly. The best headset under £100
customer_reviews.author: Samir_kouider

customer_reviews.title: Top quality sound and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: A very comfy ( the most comfy out of the 3-4 headsets I have used ) in line volume control is good and fold up mic to mute makes it easy to keep control of voice activity. Top quality sound very very clear, ive used it on my mobile for watching content and listening to music too.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a couple mounths then the microphone stopped working, my friend has had the exact same issue with his pair. I want a refund!
customer_reviews.author: joshua braithwaite

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound out of these, mic looks sturdy and shouldn't break easily. Would recommend to use with the xbox adapter that has the volume buttons for speaker volume and game volume. Can get uncomfortable if wearing for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Expectation high as a friend had recommended it sound quality was good but if the wire moved the sound would crackle
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Headset good Wire poor
customer_reviews.text: Astros headset really good but the wire is poor quailty, only had it over a month now and I store it away properly and already the wires broke! Don’t try and buy replacement wire from astros website costs £10 for the wire and a further £13 for delivery! RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Quality gaming headset with excellent value for the money. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headset when it works, just received this yesterday and seems the wire from the headset going into the controller doesn’t work? As either only one side works or the headset cuts out completely. Will have to spend more money on another wire already
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Moffat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this head set, sound quality good and really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for gaming at any level
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality headset for a great price a big upgrade from my turtle beach headset I feel like I can hear again!
customer_reviews.author: Haydn davies

customer_reviews.title: Value for money and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and value for money outstanding. The Mic part feels a little on the fragile part but after a months usage iv had no issues. Sound quality is also great for any game where sound is important
customer_reviews.author: Graham Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. There is only a slight mark on the speaker piece but you cant see it as it’s on underneath. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spot on!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend and honestly what a choice! The sound is phenomenonal build quality is sturdy and the microphone is crisp and clear. The mixamp is easy and straight forward to use and you can tweak the balances perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: misleading use of images and wording
customer_reviews.text: the pictures and wording used on the product page implied the headset will come with the remote adapter that attaches to the controller, but it doesn't. thats the reason i bought them, thats very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: B E E F Y  B A S S
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are beefy!! I bought them because I wanted to try something by Astro and these are the greatest ones I've tried so far!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 pairs of these now and the same issues happened both times, wiring comes loose and the sound in 1 of the ear phones stops working. Won't be getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Superb - 13 year old son is VERY happy with them for his xbox
customer_reviews.author: miss marmite

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are a good purchase! They are big so they cover your whole ear!
customer_reviews.author: kirsty ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset for PS4 and XBOX
customer_reviews.text: Great quality gaming headset. My 15 year old is very happy with this, he must be its attached to his head most days.
customer_reviews.author: Fandangman

customer_reviews.title: Fab headset
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys them always uses them while gaming
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This description and picture shows that it is controller mounted and it isn’t. It has a 3.5 jack connector. Not as described at all.
customer_reviews.author: lisa browne

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: Not good enough, not detailed at all. Had a better headset for £30, audio is way too loud when turned up to try to just hear smaller details
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Little tinny sound good Mic no pc cable
customer_reviews.text: Good headset sound is a little tinny would of give it 5 stars if it fit over my ears lol it does not come with 3.5 mm jack for pc had to use my razer cable
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bailey

customer_reviews.title: sound quality is great a good addition to any
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for over a month now and no issues, sound quality is great a good addition to any gamer
customer_reviews.author: Yes

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't work. No sound in one headphone. Sent it back and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: J Burnell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love em, great sound quality, great sound cancellation, use these for gaming all the time. Mic quality is good, crystal clear!!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Mellors

customer_reviews.title: great desgin
customer_reviews.text: all in all a great head set just wish the ear pieces were larger
customer_reviews.author: sharna white

customer_reviews.title: Good sound uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very good clear sound. Slightly uncomfortable after a few hours wearing them. But all in all good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headset! Use this headset everyday and they have amazing sound quality and have been wearing for hours a day and I must say they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Halliday

customer_reviews.text: Fab product but the connection has broken already and there's nowhere to contact to send back or fix?!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo77

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: An amazing headset, comfort, aesthetics and quality is all 5 star it is truly one of my favourite budget headsets I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Jamie mMcCormack

customer_reviews.title: Astro gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: My son is happy with his headset and it met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: denise hutcheon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works well my son is very pleased with them says they are by far the best ones he has had.
customer_reviews.author: claire madden

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy headset. Too heavy on pressure points. The splitter cable that comes with it is excellent otherwise I will not be wearing them much will stick to wearing my old turtle beach
customer_reviews.author: stacey hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Top quality; reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Cable is really long.. perhaps too long, but bar that it's perfect for me. Very durable, and comfy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, the headset operates completely fine with my PS4 and there seem to be no apparent issues
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Although on the new xbox controllers with just the jack the audio volume is pretty poor. Had to use the older adapter for ...
customer_reviews.text: Top quality. Although on the new xbox controllers with just the jack the audio volume is pretty poor. Had to use the older adapter for the volume boost on it for better sound and audio.
customer_reviews.author: Graham K

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like any other astro headset
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headset just like any other astro headset but a lot cheaper

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them, comfortable, well built and amazing sound quality.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work on my ps4, I can hear people but they cant here me, awful Don't get it

customer_reviews.title: Not the comfiest headset
customer_reviews.text: Audio is good, headband only has a little foam protector that is far too small, doesn't come with adapter which i never knew either.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J A Wright

customer_reviews.title: Product is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality of sound and comfortability. I couldn't believe they were that good when I started using them. Just great quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: When it works it's great, but that's only 30% of the time. The audio will randomly cut out so I can hear nothing.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is phenomenal but gets quite uncomfortable after a while! well worth the money for them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Top quality headset. Very comfortable. Worth the money all day. Would recommend to anyone looking for a good headset. Only con is the wire is long but overall don’t necessarily think thats a bad thing. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an ex demo, less than half the price but nothing wrong with them just an open box, well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: It is good
customer_reviews.text: It has good sound although it gets uncomfortable after having it on for an hour or two
customer_reviews.author: Flynn McLean

customer_reviews.title: Come broken and in bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: It came with a snapped 3.5mm jack so couldn’t use. Also came in a box that was too small to actually fit the headphones in so they put bare fragile tape around it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The left side of the headset doesn't work at all only just got them today
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not ideal for just footsteps, but still does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Kartik Kaushik

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's birthday. He is over the moon with them and after looking at more expensive ones these at such a good price we're also over the moon.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: They get quite uncomfortable after a few hours
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, decent sound quality however if you play extremely often then they can get uncomfortable after a few hours

customer_reviews.title: Good overall.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, however could be a bit louder.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The best headset I have used and I can play for hours and they are still comfy 👍

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: extremely comfy and a very good deal for only 50 pounds

customer_reviews.title: ITS OKAY!
customer_reviews.text: The audio is perfect the only problem is it gets uncomfortable after a long while and u have to take them off

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headset, one of the best I've owned so far

customer_reviews.title: Happy teenager
customer_reviews.text: Good,s arrived on time exactly as described 1 happy youth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable and painful.
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable after 30 mins of use. Do not buy, worth paying an extra £20 for a corsair void pro.
customer_reviews.author: Crispy

customer_reviews.title: Headset is not working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the headset in January and unfortunately I am now unable to talk to anyone on the headset.
customer_reviews.author: j c brindley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: This headset literally stopped working all together after a month. Biggest waste of money I’ve ever thrown away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASTRO Gaming A10 Gaming Headset - Black/Red - PC
product_meta.description:
Platform For Display:PC| Edition:Black Headset

Made to out-last your game, the A10 Headset features durable construction and extended comfort so you can play longer with no down-time. A 3.5 millimeter jack provides compatibility with nearly any device including most mobile phones and tablets. The A10 Headset is tuned for gaming with ASTRO Audio, ensuring you hear your game and your teammates with clarity and precision. With the omni directional mic featuring flip-up mute functionality and in-line Volume Control, you'll have total command of your gaming audio experience.

Headband Pressure: 4.5N
Weight w/o Cable: 346 grams
feature_bullets: Durability: The a10 headset features durable headband anodized aluminum wrapped in a damage resistant polycarbonate blend so your headset will withstand wins, losses, and everything in between
Comfort: Extended comfort memory foam ear cushions keep you from fatigue so you can play as long as you want in complete comfort
Communication: With the omnidirectional mic featuring flip up mute functionality and in line volume control, you and your teammates will always hear each other clearly and accurately
Sound quality: Tuned for gaming, the a10 features immersive and accurate audio the way sound developers intended. Low latency and precise voice communication mean you're always in sync
Compatibility: xbox one, ps4, nintendo switch, mobile, mac, and pc

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,002 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
